profile.description: I am a recently graduated systems engineer with a solid base of technical knowledge, problem solving skills and a proactive attitude. I am ready to apply my skills and contribute to the success of projects, bringing innovation and efficiency to the organizations that give me the opportunity to grow and develop professionally.

experience.first-job-description: Perform management and development tasks in the projects of the digital applications and process solutions team.
experience.second-job-description: As a Domino's pizza delivery person I had the following responsibilities: Preparation and Organization, Safe Delivery, Customer Service, Payment Handling and Vehicle Maintenance.
